actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To provide for the temporary duty-free treatment of certain sweaters manufactured in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment, through December 31, 1994, of certain sweaters manufactured in the Northern Mariana Islands.

titles.title: To provide for the temporary duty-free treatment of certain sweaters manufactured in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
